# Optinest Digital
> Small web design and SEO agency focused on technical SEO, content systems, and conversion-focused websites.

Canonical site: https://optinestdigital.com

## Primary URLs
- https://optinestdigital.com/
- https://optinestdigital.com/clients
- https://optinestdigital.com/blog
- https://optinestdigital.com/sitemap.xml
- https://optinestdigital.com/robots.txt

## Scope
- Service-focused web design and SEO content.
- Blog articles with practical implementation guidance.
